title: The worst
review: Typical Russophobe propaganda. The stereotypes about USSR are typical too.'No one is saying Stalin was a great man, but this is over the top. It does not snow year around in Russia. And shame on the fake reviews giving this film 10 stars just because you think anyone slamming this film is some sort of troll. You are the troll. I get it, you hate Russia. Congrats on buying the propaganda our government sold you. ' - 100% agreeThe tyupical stereotips about Russsia named by russians 'клюква' cranberries ))
